fields.System.Title: User Login Enhancement
fields.System.Description: As a user, I want to be able to login to the application so that I can access my account and make purchases. This includes improving the current login experience with better UI, faster authentication, and password reset functionality.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
User can enter username and password
System validates credentials against database
User is redirected to dashboard on success
Error message shown on failure
Password reset link available

fields.System.Title: Shopping Cart Persistence
fields.System.Description: As a returning customer, I want my shopping cart to be saved when I leave the site, so that I don't lose my selected items when I return. This improves the shopping experience and reduces cart abandonment.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
1) Items remain in cart after browser close
2) Cart restores on next login
3) Cart persists for 30 days maximum
4) User can manually clear cart
5) Cart syncs across devices when logged in

fields.System.Title: Advanced Product Search
fields.System.Description: Implement advanced search functionality using Elasticsearch with filters, sorting, autocomplete, and AI-powered recommendations to help users find products quickly. This will improve product discoverability and conversion rates.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
Elasticsearch integration complete
Category filters work (clothing, electronics, books)
Price range slider implemented
Autocomplete shows product suggestions
Sorting by price/popularity/rating works
Related products shown in results
Search performance under 500ms

fields.System.Title: Performance Optimization
fields.System.Description: The application needs to be faster and more responsive for better user experience. Users are complaining about slow page loads and timeouts during checkout.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
Application performance is improved
Page load times are reduced
Users report better experience

fields.System.Title: Mobile App Push Notifications
fields.System.Description: As a mobile user, I want to receive push notifications about order updates, promotions, and abandoned carts so that I stay engaged with the platform.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
Push notification service integrated
User can enable/disable notifications by type
Order status updates sent automatically
Promotional notifications respect user preferences
Abandoned cart reminder sent after 1 hour
Notification click opens relevant app screen

fields.System.Title: Customer Review System
fields.System.Description: Enable customers to leave reviews and ratings for products they have purchased. This will increase trust, provide social proof, and help other customers make informed decisions.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
Customers can write reviews for purchased products
5-star rating system implemented
Reviews display on product pages
Review moderation system in place
Verified purchase badges shown
Review sorting and filtering options
Email notifications for new reviews

fields.System.Title: Inventory Management Integration
fields.System.Description: As a warehouse manager, I want the e-commerce platform to integrate with our inventory management system so that stock levels are automatically updated and customers see accurate availability.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
Real-time inventory sync with warehouse system
Product availability updates automatically
Out-of-stock items marked clearly
Low stock warnings shown to customers
Backorder functionality for popular items
Inventory reports accessible to managers

fields.System.Title: Social Media Login Integration
fields.System.Description: As a new customer, I want to sign up and login using my social media accounts (Facebook, Google, Apple) so that I can quickly create an account without filling out lengthy forms.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
Google OAuth integration working
Facebook login option available
Apple Sign-In implemented for iOS users
User profile data imported from social accounts
Privacy settings respect user preferences
Account linking for existing email users
Secure token management implemented
